nodes.text: Ember's Fire was a club owned by Ember Chankeli, offering female companionship to paying customers, which operated on Telerath. Chankeli claimed that her business was suffering from a slaver gang operating in the city to hire former Jedi Dass Jennir to clean them out. He later stayed in the place when he arrived on Telerath.
Tam and Sylva were two employees at Ember's Fire.
